amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that none of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the Environmental Protection Agency's Criminal Enforcement Division.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 56 printed in House Report 115-297 to ensure that none of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the Environmental Protection Agency's Criminal Enforcement Division.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A085) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 227 (Roll no. 482).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A085) offered by Mr. Palmer.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A085) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 227 (Roll no. 482).
